name: Split (itch) (TwinGhosts)
description:
Game

Connect all of the nodes by dragging lines between them! Can you beat all 14 stages?

The game locally saves your progress after each stage and there's also an easter egg hidden in one of the stages!

The game was made in a day and a half.

Enjoy!

Known Issues

The level select doesn't always function as it should. Sometimes random stages that have been beat turn black again.

There are rare cases when placing a connection line on the edge of a node, that it becomes stuck and unable to be removed (still collides)

Jam

Hosted by: 8-bits to Infinity

Genre: Puzzle

Theme: Black & White

Credits

MUSIC:

SFX: Bertrof - freesound.org

FONT:  Good Timing -  Typodermic Fonts

Future

I'm currently working on turning this game into an Android game.
